# Stone Metamorphosis, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 11]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 11]], [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Stone object or stone objects touched, up to 10 cu. ft. + 1 cu. ft./level

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Underdark (WotC), pg. 61

This spell functions like *[[Stone Metamorphosis (Spell)|stone metamorphosis]]*, except as noted.
